reviews.review: kinda like Dead Bits but instead of Bits its By Daylight

Dead by Daylight is a very fun game, when u play alone or with friends the game activities are very unice and easy to handle(mostly). Even thought i shet my pants everytime i play it i would recommend for people who like a little gore and horror aswell as leveling and using a lot of game mechanics! Everytime i play this game with my friends a lot of emotions come to light, it can lead to a lot of screaming to so be prepared. :)
Спалил старый стул полыханием из жопы. Спасибо игре за то что появился повод купить новый. Определенно рекомендую
The game is nice and its fun to play with friends 10/10 xd

es el mejor juego de la historia,increible desarrollo tanto de los supervivientes y los asesinos,la profundidad de cada historia es increible,y no hablemos de la jugabilidad,al primer momento del juego ya sabes para donde hay que ir y como desplazarte.un gran juego.
This is my favorite and least favorite game simultaneously. Love and hate it. Respectfully.
Запудренный кошмар со вкусом говна. Тот самый случай когда у разработчиков игры нужно отобрать права на эту игру и передать разработку адекватной студии, которая не юзает спиды
ляпота, пару раз можно даже обосраться
very fun game as a survivor but not as a killer

Thanks to constant survivor buffs(i dont blame devs because the rebbit survivors have complained non-stop for 5 years) this game is about as fun as "I win" for survivors and "play clean and lose until you rage the fuck out and facecamp/tunnel 5 parties in a row" as the killer.
This game is the perfect "I'm a victim; simulator" see you bully the killer for hours until you finally lose and then you hit the forums and cry about it until they take out what ever feature assisted in your defeat.

Man verbringt gefühlt 15 min damit, eine Lobby zu finden. In der Zeit könnt ihr locker 2 Runden "Propnight" zocken, welches vom Prinzip genauso aufgebaut ist. Ich empfehle "Dbd" nicht weiter.

+Propnight

-Dead by Daylight
求生者无法对游戏里的你造成伤害，但能让你患上高血压

kozak gierka, najlepiej z kolegami
subujcie boxdela

llevo enganchado por mas de dos años, es adictivo, el sistema de progresion es avasallador (para los fans de yetmo, avasallador es algo mas o menos como sorprendente, increible, muy bien llevado a cabo), es un grande que ha hecho su propio genero ya que varios clones han salido a la luz y no han podido derribarlo, veamos que tal viene VHS, que tenga apoyo de buenas licencias y que se mantenga sacando contenido y que no muera como Friday The 13th, Home Sweet Home, etc. Por lo pronto DBD es el campeon :)

The game is really fun and has a lot to do.
Some moment can even be scary when you're not aware of what's happening around you as well.
Eu não consigo abrir o jogo aparece que não está funcionando quando eu clico em entrar eu pedi reembolso quero meu dinheiro de volta
Forced to play it, still hate it. Good game with friends.
한 대만 때리게 해줘 나쁜 놈들아

Dead by Daylight é jogo muito bom que você pode jogar solo ou com os amigos, onde você pode ser o assassino ou o sobrevivente, como sobrevivente você precisa fugir do assassino e fazer os geradores junto com seu time, após fazer todos os gerados necessários, você pode abrir os portões e fugir, como assassino você precisa matar os sobreviventes antes de conseguirem abrir os portões, recomendo muito o game, tem muito conteúdo, muitas builds, muitos personagens e dá para conseguir as melhores "habilidades" de forma free o que deixa o game melhor ainda, super recomendo !!! a unica coisa que estraga um pouco o jogo são os campers e os grupos de survivor que ficam em call, passar call nesse jogo é muito quebrado, O jogo é muito bom, super recomendo, porém, se você quer achar o jogo mais divertido foque em jogar de survivor, o jogo é muito quebrado pra survivor.
이 게임을 깐 뒤 왠만한 일론 화가 잘 안나요
应该加强下屠夫游戏体验了
这游戏我一直觉得不错，觉得算是这个题材的天花板了，也给的好评。但是最近匹配机制真恶心到了，你Epic免费送游戏，然后跨平台不让关，荧虹段每把必排到两个新手，天天被屠夫追五六分钟，然后一上树发现队友一台没修开蹲蘑菇，过来看你一眼听到心跳也不走开修机也不救人，以后玩人只找朋友四黑了，爱游戏环境咋咋吧，吐了。
Is fun. Much stabs. Lots of hiding.
The developers are involved with NFTs.
Too many killer camper making the game so hard to win

Интересная хоть и дисбалансная игра.Не любишь легких путей,любишь пот и страдания то добро пожаловать в наш клуб маньяков.Любишь часто побеждать?Собирай друзей заходите в дискорд и у мана шансы на победу крайне низки)))).Эта игра принесла мне массу эмоций.Главное запасись стульями ведь гореть пятая точка будет часто))))Рекомендую эту игру.Лучшая в своем жанре

중국 핵쟁이들이 많이 빡침 이놈들좀 어떻게 해줘 제발...
초창기부터 지금까지 이새끼들이 문제야
Good concept; Terrible execution by BHVR
Been a fan since my friend told me to play this game. I love the crossovers from other horror games and movies. Great strategy horror game!

Its pretty fun once you get into it. I would recommend trying to find a friend in the start to play with so you can get some help from them. Both sides are fun but if you just start playing a killer without perks and addons its pretty survivor sided so just be ready.
人类修机速度飞快，一般屠夫玩家很难有游戏体验。人类专心修机基本一局也就几分钟.现在谁还玩屠夫啊，狗都不玩

This is probably the best game I have ever played. Its characters and game-play are very good and its intense hide and seek system is great, if you do buy this game, I suggest you tell some friends to as well because I think its best played with friends. So if you are looking for a game to buy, I recommed dead by daylight.

аналогия игры с ты чинишь генератор и слышишь террор "я вижу маньяка, АААААААААААА!!!!!". И твои тиммейты такие - "уведи его подальше от нас, ты конечно нас не видишь, но не веди его к нам и нам насрать на то убьют тебя или нет, просто не веди его к нам". Ты привел его к нам и он нас даже не ударил? Мы обосрем твой профиль и накидаем тебе репортов. В общем игра вызывающая только положительные эмоции
Ist schon nice, lohnt sich aufjedenfall zu kaufen.
好平衡阿!!難怪沒人要玩殺手。殺手馬上排馬上好,人要排超久。遇到四排地圖又好可以直接擺爛了。存心要整死你。殺手好帥??有用?被拿來刷分用而已。

Very fun game to play and has a lot of replay value, and play way more often than I would like to admit! 

However, since the changes to matchmaking, the game has gone downhill a lot with constant bugs, frame drops, and also matchmaking people with very different skill levels making it unfair or too easy for all involved. 

Devs don't listen to the community and resolve the constant issues we all receive. But instead, react by releasing a new DLC that is usually broken and causes more issues on top of the pre-existing ones.
güzel bir oyun ama bence katiller gereksiz güçlü
垃圾游戏 没开挂乱封号
топ! была раздача в епик геймс ,но я купил в стиме и теперь играю с друзьями))

Si es premade tunelea.

Absolutely love the game....its fun with friends but also alone it can become fun after you figured out the game.....recommend for sure!
dont support anything to do with this game

I would say over all this game is fun, it can be super frustrating sometimes both as killer and as survivor. People can be super toxic or really nice but thats the internet for ya. I would say the devs are trying for this game but just refuse to take advice from people who play at higher levels, so the game is more catered towards lower to mid skill level because once you get to higher level as killer you are forced into camping for a kill to have even a small chance at a win. (Lucky I am not fully at that point) and for survivor if you get to the higher levels you can expected getting tunneled and just gotta live with it. I would say the best part is the longer games when you are having a back and fourth holding on to the last gen and you get that one down that just snowballs the end of the game and you get that last hook and look around and realize dang that was the longest 15 minutes ever.
After playing the game for more amount of time, with many breaks this my over all view of this game is it is not worth the time you put in. Just don't play this toxic spawning fest of a game. almost all of the players are super anti other player side and the devs at this point encourage it more and more. The amount of games I have been getting in with subtle cheaters is just pointless to play. This has been one of the only game that I have sadly sunk this much time into and I regret every second of it. Good by DBD I hope you fix the toxic pool of degenerates you have but seeing you are more focused on fixing all the other mistakes you made prob wont happen.
